### What you will find:

<p style="text-align:left;"> 

1. The obesity rate are increasing in all 56 sates from 2011 to present in the US.
 
2. Nebraska has the highest obesity rate among all state, and people are changing from overweight to obesity in the sate.

3. For obesity rate by race, the white own the lowest obesity rate, while American Indian or Alaskan native has the highest obesity rate.
4. For obesity rate by gender, we can obviously see female have lower rate of obesity than male
5. For obesity rate by education level, college graduate have lower obesity rate than people who never go to collage.
6. For obesity rate by income, people with lower income tend to have higher obesity rate.
7. The interaction between high caloric food consumption and alcohol consumption are statistically significant. This indicate high caloric food consumption has a different effect on the obesity rate depending on the values of alcohol consumption.
</p>
